actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit certain incompatible activities within any area of the national park system.

summary.text: Prohibits the exploration for and the mining of and the purchase of all valuable mineral deposits within any area of the National Park System, subject to valid existing rights. Repeals specified laws which permit such mining in conflict with the priorities of this Act. Authorizes the Secretary of Interior to promulgate regulations he deems necessary for governing valid existing mining and exploration rights in any area of the National Park System.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit certain incompatible activities within any area of the national park system.
